chunk:
Holika Holika Liplief Steaming Lip Mask

Brand: Holika

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Glycerin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Paraffin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyethylene, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Cera Microcristallina (EU), Propylene Carbonate, Caprylyl G

arbonate, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Water, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ceramide NP, Santalum Album (Sandalwood) Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Butylene Glycol, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract, Di

ica Stem Extract, Disodium Phosphate.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
